file_insights.changes_summary: Added JSON Schema handling for Pydantic BaseModel in chat() method
key_modifications: Updated response_format type hint to support Pydantic BaseModel
Added support for extracting JSON schema from Pydantic models
Implemented logic to pass JSON schema to OpenAI API for structured output

patterns_discovered: Using type hints for flexible method signatures
Leveraging Pydantic models for runtime type validation and schema generation
Adding debug logging for advanced configuration options
gotchas_discovered: Handling different response format types (text, json, Pydantic model)
Ensuring type checking works with isinstance() and issubclass()
Properly passing JSON schema to OpenAI API with correct structure
recommendations: Add comprehensive unit tests for different response_format scenarios
Consider adding error handling for unsupported response format types
Document the new Pydantic model response format capability in project documentation
